definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: A partition surfaced in foil wall covering stands in lieu of a headboard.
sentences.chinese: 一面金属箔片饰面的隔墙替代了床头板原先的位置。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to one kind of decalcomania paper for porcelain surface decoration and its usage.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种瓷器饰面用贴花纸及其使用方法。

sentences.english: Based on these problems, the paper analysed ten taboos for dressing up outside walls of buildings for reference.
sentences.chinese: 分析了外墙建筑涂料饰面做法十忌，供建筑施工参考。

sentences.english: Do not install surface-mounted items until finishes have been completed on substrates involved.
sentences.chinese: 饰面处理完成后再进行不需要表面处理的安装项目。

sentences.english: Melamine board is also called the double-sized veneer board or once-molding board.
sentences.chinese: 板又叫做双饰面板，也有人称它为一次成型板。

sentences.english: High quality Chinese wood and MDF with fireproof veneer, standard accessories.
sentences.chinese: 优质国产木材及人造板贴防火板饰面，基本配置。

sentences.english: A "golf" snack area's custom bleachers are reclaimed cedar.
sentences.chinese: 一个“高尔夫”快餐区的定制台为再生雪松饰面。

sentences.english: The interal bonding strength of the layers of the overlayed boards were tested, and result was satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，石膏刨花板具有良好的饰面性能。

sentences.english: Fire-treated Western red cedar was used to clad the exterior walls.
sentences.chinese: 红色火烧雪松板用于外墙的饰面。

sentences.english: The wall of wood veneer, which is attached to the wall, is provided with an invisible door to the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 贴墙纸的木饰面装饰墙中，设置了通往卧室的隐形门。

sentences.english: The interior space features walnut cabinetry and stainless steel work surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 室内部分采用了胡桃木家具和不锈钢饰面。

sentences.english: Much modern furniture is not solid but using a sandwich of wood veneer on plywood.
sentences.chinese: 实心木料，而是在胶合板上镶上一层木板饰面而已。

sentences.english: Floor fills or other special floor finishes can result in significant dead loads.
sentences.chinese: 楼板填充物或其它特殊楼板饰面会产生很大恒载。

sentences.english: The walls are now clad with new baffle walls with a limewood veneer.
sentences.chinese: 墙上现在覆盖了新的椴木饰面隔音板。

sentences.english: Casas came up with the idea of sandblasting the solid surfacing for the master bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 卡萨斯提出在主卫采用喷沙固体饰面处理。

definition: to apply paint, veneer etc/to plaster over/decorative coating/finish/veneer
to point a brick wall/to grout a tiled surface
